Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>My husband is the living end. If only he
weren't so pigheaded!<sp:0:4:0>I want to support him, of course, but
suppose he does win the election under
these circumstances. What then?<sp:0:4:0>It wouldn't change or improve anything.
Talk_18:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Eep... <sp:5:0:0>I wasn't expecting that.<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>I'd love to know what you're doing in
this house.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Do you have nowhere else to stay? I can't
put you up here. Head left from the exit
and you'll find <clr:0000>Ton Pu Inn<clr:ffff>.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>I know this seems like a good time for me
to show you around the village, but I have
to go clean <clr:0000>Princess Zelda's house<clr:ffff> now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I need to keep it in pristine shape for the
day the princess returns to us.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Eep! <sp:5:1:0>Oh, it's you... These sudden
appearances aren't good for the nerves.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I don't have a room fixed up for company,
but you're welcome to stay here for as
long as it suits you.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>I do want to show you around the village,
and it's true that my work is done now.<sp:0:4:0>But it's gotten dark and I need to get
home. <sp:5:0:0>Have you found a place to stay?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you haven't, you should get a room at
<clr:0000>Ton Pu Inn<clr:ffff> on the main road.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Oh! I've been wanting to thank you for
how the mayoral election turned out!<sp:0:4:0>My husband and Cece have found a way
to put their differences aside.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Though if I know them, they'll be fighting
again soon enough. They're too much
alike to stay civil for long.<sp:0:4:0>Well, when the time comes, I think Sophie
and I know how to handle them now.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The princess was never one to turn away
anyone who wanted to be here.<sp:0:4:0>That's why it would always get crowded
with kids as soon as lessons were over.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm looking forward to the day when she
comes back with a smile on her face, as if
none of this ever happened.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Oh my. Somehow, you don't look any
different even when you're soaked.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you're looking for my husband, he's
busy with his new vegetable scheme in
the field at Nack's place.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>It doesn't seem to be going very well.<sp:5:0:0>
If it's not one thing with that man, it's
another, I swear.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>So you ended up helping him again, eh?<sp:0:4:0>I'll take anything that lightens the load
on my husband. Honestly, thank you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>The villagers have to work together, and
that includes my husband with his <clr:0000>sun
pumpkins<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>He seems eager to work with Cece to
keep our town booming, I'll give him that.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sorry, but not now.<sp:0:4:0>My husband told me he's on his way to
Ventest Clothing, and I have to be ready
for what comes after.<sp:0:4:0>Never heard of it? The clothing shop right
near the village entrance?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>But no, I really can't get into it right now.
Deep breaths, Clavia.<sp:0:4:0>There'll be time to entertain guests later.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>I do want to show you around the village,
and it's true that my work is done now.<sp:0:4:0>But I'm much too tired for that tonight.<sp:5:0:0>
If you need something, can it please wait
until tomorrow?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>I know you're in the mood to chat, but
I can't now. I have to go clean <clr:0000>Princess
Zelda's house<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Though I'd love to have a good, long
chat some other time!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's gotten dark and I need to go
home soon.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Ton Pu Inn<clr:ffff> is a popular choice among
travelers, so if you don't reserve a bed
quickly, there might not be any left.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> owned this house, back
before the Upheaval.<sp:0:4:0>She believed that the children of Hateno
Village were important to Hyrule. So she
founded a school in our village.<sp:5:1:0>
She lived here in this village to oversee
construction of the schoolhouse.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I don't really know where she went, but
I'm sure our princess will come back.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>I keep the place tidy so it's ready for her
whenever she returns.<sp:0:4:0>The princess was never one to turn
anyone away from here, so you're free
to come and go as you please too.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>You ought to be my guest, and instead
I end up asking you for favors. Sorry
about that.<sp:0:4:0>But you were a huge help. Thank you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>If only that man could be more forthright.
He takes everything so seriously that he
sometimes doesn't know how to open up.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>No one knows him like me, so it's up to
me to give him my support.
